## Description {#details}

Match a specified integer value or vector of all elements of that value.

<code>BitWidth</code> optionally specifies the bitwidth the matched constant must have. If it is 0, the matched constant can have any bitwidth.

Definition at line 72 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanpatternmatch-h">VPlanPatternMatch.h</a>.
